TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider extends System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider

summary.span: 通过客户端应用程序服务实现 Windows 身份验证。

span.span: Enables Windows authentication with client application services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用客户端应用程序服务通过使用 Windows 身份验证来验证用户。You can use client application services to validate users by using Windows authentication. 若要启用 Windows 身份验证，你可以配置应用程序使用类。To enable Windows authentication, you configure your application to use the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：配置客户端应用程序服务](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md)。For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md). 完成配置后中,，你可以验证用户通过调用`static`方法。After configuration, you can validate users by calling the `static` method. 方法内部调用方法。The method internally calls the method. 方法自动进行身份验证当前用户，并将设置`static`属性对象，其中包含当前。The method automatically authenticates the current user and sets the `static` property to a object that contains the current . 如果配置对于你的应用程序，你可以使用通过角色服务中检索用户角色信息的对象。If a is configured for your application, you can use the object to retrieve user role information from the roles service. 你可以检索对当前的引用实例通过`static`属性。You can retrieve a reference to the current instance through the `static` property. 你可使用成员资格提供程序引用调用直接的方法。You can use the membership provider reference to call the method directly. 此外，你将需要要调用的成员资格提供程序引用方法，在中不可用基类。Additionally, you will need the membership provider reference to call the method, which is not available in the base class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法使用 Windows 身份验证对用户进行身份验证。The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to authenticate a user by using Windows authentication. 在此示例中，值`static`属性被强制转换为实例。In this example, the value of the `static` property is cast to a instance. 这将确保意外测试，则此代码通过使用另一个的成员资格提供程序将引发。This makes sure that a will be thrown if you accidentally test this code by using another membership provider. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#309](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#309)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#309](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#309)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows 身份验证使用用户登录到计算机或域时，由操作系统提供的标识。Windows authentication uses the identity supplied by the operating system when a user logs on to the computer or domain. 因此，用户凭据与相关的属性不相关的此类。Therefore, properties related to user credentials are not relevant for this class.

public: void Logout();

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为通过客户端应用程序服务进行身份验证的用户`static`属性设置为对象，它启用对配置的角色服务的访问。For users authenticated through client application services, the `static` property is set to a object that enables access to the configured role service. 方法重置属性对象，其中包含当前。The method resets the property to a object that contains the current . 调用此方法后，不再可以检索角色的用户通过类。After you call this method, you can no longer retrieve roles for the user through the class. 若要重新进行身份验证当前用户，调用方法。To reauthenticate the current user, call the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法来注销用户。The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to log out the user. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#310](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#310)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#310](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#310)]

summary.span: 使用操作系统提供的标识自动对当前用户进行身份验证。

span.span: Automatically authenticates the current user by using the identity supplied by the operating system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你配置应用程序使用类， `static` 方法将使用其实现此方法。When you configure your application to use the class, the `static` method will use this method for its implementation. 方法自动进行身份验证当前用户，并将设置`static`属性对象，其中包含当前。The method automatically authenticates the current user and sets the `static` property to a object that contains the current . 如果配置对于你的应用程序，你可以使用通过角色服务中检索用户角色信息的对象。If a is configured for your application, you can use the object to retrieve user role information from the roles service. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法使用 Windows 身份验证对用户进行身份验证。The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to authenticate a user by using Windows authentication. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#309](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#309)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#309](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#309)]
